name: Balsamic Vinegar Sauce
keywords: balsamic vinegar, shiitake, tomato, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and thinly sliced
2 cloves garlic, peeled and thinly sliced
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cut 6 tablespoons of the butter into 1/2-inch cubes. Refrigerate. Melt the remaining butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, mushroom stems, tomato and bay leaf. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are soft but not brown, about 6 minutes.

Add vinegar and water. Reduce over medium high heat until just a syrupy liquid remains, about 8 minutes. Lower the heat slightly. Whisk in the cold butter, 2 to 3 pieces at a time, allowing each addition to be absorbed before adding the next. Strain through a fine sieve. Season with salt and pepper. Keep warm over a double boiler.
